name: Just Solitaire: Aces Up
description:
"I am addicted. Love it."

"Great game when I need a break."

Play Aces Up solitaire, one of the simplest, quick and fun solitaire games. Move cards around my tapping or dragging them. In Aces Up you simply look for cards of the same suit and remove the one lower in value. You can choose between different backgrounds and card designs.
